name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel - Shining Pom Bait Pack 2
summary: This pack contains 3 consumable baits that, when used, will lure out an elusive Shining Pom. Defeating these rare creatures in battle will reward a massive amount of EXP, helping your party reach new heights. Once used, they will disappear from your inventory.
